Description: TEXAS A&M UNIVERSITY AT GALVESTON DIRECT SUPPORT PAYMENTS. TO EDUCATE AND TRAIN FUTURE MERCHANT MARINE OFFICERS AT THE STATE MARITIME ACADEMIES (SMA).
